name: C S Lewis Quotes
author: ?rjan Hoyd V?llestad (Hello Dolly: Matt Mullenweg)

sections.description:
This a plugin, similiar to the well known dolly-plugin. It gives you
randomly quots from C.S. Lewis, the man behind the Narnia chronicles.
sections.installation:
1. Upload lewis_quotes.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Where can I read more about C. S. Lewis?

From wikipedia: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/C_s_lewis

What did he do?

He did at least write books. Here is a list: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/C_s_lewis#Bibliography
